<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.GetFullLabelAjax</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>true</client_callable> <description/> <name>GetFullLabelAjax</name> <script><![CDATA[var GetFullLabelAjax = Class.create();
GetFullLabelAjax.prototype =Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
process: function() { var name = this.getParameter('sysparm_full_name'); if (name) return new CompositeElement(name).getFullLabel(); return ''; }
});]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>dave.dixon</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2010-03-15 18:56:10</sys_created_on> <sys_id>632eb37c0a0a0b9400c363243cdf18f2</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>GetFullLabelAjax</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="UI Policy Rules" source="com.glide.ui_policy">6facf4436d2220100acb70b353433060</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_632eb37c0a0a0b9400c363243cdf18f2</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>dave.dixon</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2010-03-15 19:30:03</sys_updated_on> <u_script_length>303</u_script_length> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
